parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To be storm-tossed. From the same as cheimon; to storm, i.e. to labor under a gale.
Exceedingly, vehemently. Adverb from the same as sphodra; very much.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Next in order, the next day, the following day, at the period immediately following. From echo; successive.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
A throwing out, a jettisoning of cargo to lighten a ship. From ekballo; ejection, i.e. a throwing overboard of the cargo.
